last_episode_to_air.name: Sluts
last_episode_to_air.overview: Tensions bubble over in court. Andy's parents are forced to acknowledge what kind of upbringing they have given their son, Ray realises that he may have done more harm than good by keeping his secrets, and Zoe and Dip seek some kind of retribution against Andy.

name: The Hunting
overview: When two high school teachers discover students are sharing explicit photos of their underage friends and peers online, the revelation has devastating consequences for the students and their families.

episodes.name: Pics or It Didn't Happen
episodes.overview: When teacher Ray finds a naked photo of diligent student Amandip (Dip) Dhaliwal on the phone of her new boyfriend Nassim Bitar, he decides to keep his students safe from repercussions and not report it. But, when he finds the photo has been uploaded to an illegal website, Ray is thrown into a spin.

episodes.name: Dtf?
episodes.overview: Amandip's picture is uploaded to the internet where her conservative Punjabi mother finds it, and Zoe's private sexting with popular boy Andy is leaked all around the school.

episodes.name: #shittyboys
episodes.overview: Zoe's story breaks publicly, throwing Andy's family into disarray. Zoe allies with Nassim and Amandip, and convinces them to go public too.

episodes.name: Sluts
episodes.overview: Tensions bubble over in court. Andy's parents are forced to acknowledge what kind of upbringing they have given their son, Ray realises that he may have done more harm than good by keeping his secrets, and Zoe and Dip seek some kind of retribution against Andy.
